metadata.synopsis: This argument is the beginning of the situation. The three of them are yelling at each other out in the open. The brothers believe Ethel has taken their sister, while she is denying any knowledge of the girl.

0.speaker: Demir
0.text: She went to see you. We know she did.
0.context: NodeContext: Trying to calm the situation - you don't want it to get violent and you're also terrified of Ethel/

3.text: You know absolutely nothing, you eejit.
3.context: NodeContext: Said with a laugh as your shrug the accusations off.

2.speaker: Johl
2.context: NodeContext: Voice rising. You're getting more angry and you're tired of Ethel dodging your accusations.

5.speaker: Johl
5.text: Do you harass every old woman you meet?
5.context: NodeContext: Arguing with the two brothers - you're trying to talk your way out.

4.speaker: Demir
4.text: Just tell us where she is. We don't want any trouble.
4.context: NodeContext: Trying to calm the situation - you don't want it to get violent and you're also terrified of Ethel/

7.speaker: Johl
7.text: But you're bloody getting some if you don't 'fess up.
7.context: NodeContext: Voice rising. You're getting more angry and you're tired of Ethel dodging your accusations.

6.text: You're both this close to getting a slap.
6.context: NodeContext: Annoyed and unimpressed. You're having none of these brothers  and they're starting to piss you off.

1.speaker: Johl
1.text: Enough. We know you have her.
1.context: NodeContext: You're getting tired of Ethel - and trying to sound threatening.

8.speaker: Demir
8.text: Please, we just want Mayrina back.
8.context: NodeContext: Trying to calm the situation - you don't want it to get violent and you're also terrified of Ethel/
